bug.author: dciborow
bug.summary: [BUG] System does not allow for create of file named "aux"
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
I have no idea why... <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9027725/75796818-32d0f080-5d42-11ea-8667-916103108230.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: Is this on Windows? AUX, CON, LPT and PRN are reserved filenames.
I changed the data download functions to use auxi rather than aux for auxiliary data. Still need to fix examples using the old nomenclature, before closing this Issue.
